📂DEMO


Explore the powerful world of possibilities with Cover System! Our solution offers unparalleled flexibility and smoothness in implementing cover mechanics in your game. With an advanced environment detection system, players can fully utilize the terrain, hiding behind obstacles and strategizing their moves. Our solution not only provides smooth and realistic animations from the Cover Set package but also comes with detailed and extensive documentation, making it easy to leverage the system. Elevate the quality of gameplay and add a new dimension of tactics with Cover System.


Cover System with built-in systems -

  • Wall detection
  • Detection of wall sizes (and the ability to automatically transition from Cover High animation to Cover Crouch animation)
  • Passing through obstacles
  • Detection of wall edges and the ability to trigger character leaning animation around a given corner of the wall.
  • Throwing distractions to bait enemies


If you only need animations, please check out the Cover Set pack.


We want the product to be of the highest quality, and we want you to be as satisfied as possible. So if something isn't working or if you have any questions, please ask them on Discord or in the question section. We are also available via email.
